title: fs: large group of 21 N28's and N29's (non-baseball)
author: bcornell

posts.post_title: fs: large group of 21 N28's and N29's (non-baseball)
posts.post_content:
I have a group of 21 non-baseball athletes: 3 N28's and 18 N29's.  These came out of a recent REA lot.  I'd ask $525 ppd. (that's $25/card) or a best offer.  I'll pick up the insurance cost.  Any form of payment is okay, including PayPal.  PM me if interested or send an email to [url]bill@t207.com[/url].

The list of athletes and conditions from the REA description:

1888 N28 Allen & Ginter (3 cards): Daly (billiards, Gd-Vg), Frey (pool, Vg), and Vignaux (billiards, corner chip in the lower right, otherwise Vg-Ex). 

1889 N29 Allen & Ginter (18 cards): Crist (cyclist, Gd - small piece of tape on back), East (oarsman, Vg), Ives (cyclist, Gd), Lange (walker, Gd), McGee (pugilist, Gd-Vg), J. Murphy (pugilist, Vg-Ex), Myers (runner, Vg), O'Connor (oarsman, Vg-Ex), Ross (all-around athlete, Vg-Ex), Webb (swimmer, Vg), and Wood (cyclist, Vg/Vg-Ex); 
seven cards are slightly trimmed: Albert (pedestrian), Barry (hammer thrower; owner's initial in ink on back at bottom), Daly (all-around athlete; small piece of tape on back), Ford (all-around athlete), Hill (club swinger), Ray (pole vaulter), and Stone (cyclist).

[IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/rea/n29.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/rea/n29-2.jpg[/IMG]

I'm taking the liberty of bumping this thread once.  The asking price has been reduced to $525 ppd.  I'd like to sell this group, so if I'm (still) wildly off, feel free to make an offer.  Thanks.


Bill
